flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: This Quad-Rotor Helicopter is a complete System.  It's Sub-Systems include a Ground Control Station (GCS), Remote Control Unit (RCU), Test-Stand and the Vehicle itself.
guide.title: Quad-Rotor Helicopter with Remote Control, Ground Station and Test Stand
